title: Watch: What Deepika Padukone, AR Rahman,  Shekhar Kapur said at the Cannes film festival
content:
her confidence when she said:“I truly believe where India wen have to be in the cannes , cannes will be in the india” Words of gold✨👌🏻#DeepikaPadukone #DeepikaAtCannes #Queen #Cannes2022 pic.twitter.com/LJeq8QWi5W— Deepina♡︎ (@xrdeepi) May 18, 2022
